data.message: I Just Don't Give A Fuck about it and Tomorrow I Still Dont Give a Fuck And I don't Even think You are The Real Slim Shady, and if you dont like me i dont care because thats The Way I Am, So When I'm Gone, Just Loose It and Clean Out Your Closet Because Your Guilty Conscience Told you to...After All You live in a White America with Evil Deeds and you get yourself in to a Mosh then Puke and you rename yourself Rainman and Follow The Yellow Brick Road and Sing For The Moment till you get Amityville and when you get there the people will Kill You and you and your crew will die Like Toy Soldiers. It's Never Enough for you, you're just a Big Weenie and you need to Spend Some Time alone to think about Stan and how you caused his death, Deja Vu Mutch? Why don't you just Loose Yourself in it all like you had Brain Damage just Be Careful What You Wish For, My Darling, I know you are Beautiful and I can hear Bagpipes from Baghdad and you may be Insane but listen to this Mr. Mathers... You wanna know what My Name Is..... I'm Shady... The Real SLIM SHADY! and We Made You so go Crack a Bottle!
